comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body:
Well, the events API is pretty kittened up since the megaservers were introduced. However, it seems to be possible to still track the events as described over here: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Megaserver-Event-Start-Times-and-End-Times/

(note: i have never messed around with the events API since dragon timers popped up everywhere back then…)

comments.author: The Demonic Spirit.3157
comments.body:
There were many events trackers sites such as http://divinitysreach.com/map/en/2003/
However , all events trackers have been disabled. I think that the new megaserver system caused that.
I’m not talking about the world-events tracker ,but the normal events.

Are there any new events trackers avaliable ?
